sentences.sContent: The painting was judged a fake.
Jones can spot a fake from 20 feet away.
sentences.sCn: 琼斯在20英尺开外就能认出假货。

phrases.pCn: 人造革；假裘皮；仿造皮毛

words.tran: 摊贩；骗子；伪造者，伪装者

trans.tranOther: a copy of a valuable object, painting etc that is intended to deceive people
to pretend to be ill, interested etc when you are not
made to look like a real material or object in order to deceive people
